participant_1.background: i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i am a stunt double as my second job. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.

participant_2.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side.

content.text: hi, how are you? what do you do for a living? I am in stunt
